00023 #ifndef _BUS_H_
00024 #define _BUS_H_
00025 
00026 /* BUS protocol format
00027  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028  * |0xFE|0xFE|to-adr|fm-adr|checksum|flags|cmd|length|data|data|data|data|0xFD|
00029  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030  *
00031  * The length of a message is total length - 7 bytes (premble, to-adr, fm-adr,checksum,cmd,length,postamble)
00032  * 
00033  * If you wish to transmit messages to all the devices on the bus you can use the broadcast address
00034  * BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR (0x00). The checksum is calculated by adding flags+cmd+length+data[...]
00035 */
00036

00224 typedef struct {
00226         unsigned char from_addr;
00228         unsigned char to_addr;
00230         unsigned char checksum;
00232         unsigned char flags;
00234         unsigned char cmd;
00236         unsigned char length;
00238         unsigned char data[BUS_MESSAGE_DATA_SIZE];
00239 } BUS_MESSAGE;
00240 
00242 typedef struct rx_linked_list {
00244         BUS_MESSAGE message[BUS_RX_QUEUE_SIZE];
00246         unsigned char first;
00248         unsigned char last;
00249 } rx_queue_struct;
00250 
00252 typedef struct tx_linked_list {
00254         BUS_MESSAGE message[BUS_TX_QUEUE_SIZE];
00256         unsigned char first;
00258         unsigned char last;
00259 } tx_queue_struct;
